channel.title: Marcov Model on Sandeep Gunda
channel.description: Recent content in Marcov Model on Sandeep Gunda

item.title: Fake Review Generation
item.description: To prove that public opinion of businesses can be easily manipulated by fake reviews, we generated a topic model which generates restaurant reviews based on real restaurant reviews. We aggregated, cleaned and developed a corpus of restaurant reviews from Yelp. Designed Marcov, LSTM and RNN deep learning models to train on the texts and predict the upcoming texts or characters. Obtained the most realistic reviews using the LSTM model.
